responses.content: When I look back at the dreams that we've had and what the social enterprise means over the last couple decades, it's a very rich user interface that kind of front ends all of our services. responses.content: Our Customer Data Platform, branded as Customer 360 Audiences, is powered by Hyperforce architecture. In Q4, CDP significantly boosted Marketing Cloud performance, driving higher engagement and conversion rates.
